newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's Feb inflation 0.1 pct vs 1.5 pct yr ago.
newsitem.headline: Peru's Feb inflation 0.1 pct vs 1.5 pct yr ago.

text.p: Peruvian consumer prices rose 0.1 percent in February, compared with a 1.5 percent rise in the same month last year and a 0.5 percent rise in January, the government said Saturday.
Consumer prices in Peru rose 11.8 percent in 1996, compared with a 10.2 percent rise in 1995.
The government estimates accumulated inflation will be nine percent this year and will drop to "the level of industrialized countries" by 2000.
